pullRequest.title: Merge fields in backend ir

commit.message:
merge fields when building the BackendIR, fixes the hero_name test case

Note: the code that evaluates @skip/@include is (and AFAIK, has always
been) wrong because grouped fields can have different include conditions
that should be combined using "or"

nodes.bodyText: Can we move this logic out of the BackendIrBuilder.kt into separate file? We do have FrontendIrMergeUtils, do you think it will be better to move this logic over there?
Why not just merger all fields into one field?
